content:
Getting the error below when I have the following in a profile:

        <patternContactPoint>
            <system value="phone"/>
        </patternContactPoint>

at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.StructureDefinitionRenderer.summariseValue(StructureDefinitionRenderer.java:324)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.StructureDefinitionRenderer.txItem(StructureDefinitionRenderer.java:562)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.StructureDefinitionRenderer.tx(StructureDefinitionRenderer.java:509)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateOutputsStructureDefinition(Publisher.java:7695)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateResourceHtml(Publisher.java:6709)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateHtmlOutputs(Publisher.java:6653)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generate(Publisher.java:4906)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:888)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:732)
at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8417)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.StructureDefinitionRenderer.summariseValue(StructureDefinitionRenderer.java:324) (00:48.0577)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.StructureDefinitionRenderer.txItem(StructureDefinitionRenderer.java:562) (00:48.0578)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.renderers.StructureDefinitionRenderer.tx(StructureDefinitionRenderer.java:509) (00:48.0579)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateOutputsStructureDefinition(Publisher.java:7695) (00:48.0579)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateResourceHtml(Publisher.java:6709) (00:48.0580)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateHtmlOutputs(Publisher.java:6653) (00:48.0580)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generate(Publisher.java:4906) (00:48.0581)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:888) (00:48.0581)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:732) (00:48.0582)
org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8417) (00:48.0582)
My workaround for now is to use a fixedCode on system instead of patternContactPoint on telecom.
Rick, can you raise a Git issue against the validator? (https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core)
fixed next release. (btw, this is not an issue against the validator, but the publisher)
